ai-iti20:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti20:2.1_0: “Mendicants, when I’ve comprehended the mind of a person whose mind is corrupted, I understand:
ai-iti20:2.2_0: ‘If this person were to die right now, they would be cast down to hell.’
ai-iti20:2.5_0: Corruption of mind is the reason why some sentient beings, when their body breaks up, after death, are reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.”
ai-iti20:2.6_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti20:4.2_0: were to die at this time,
ai-iti20:5.1_0: Such a person is raised up as surely
ai-iti20:5.2_0: as if they’d been carried and put there.
ai-iti20:5.3_0: For corruption of mind is the reason
ai-iti20:5.4_0: sentient beings go to a bad place.”
ai-iti20:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
